name: demo-storefront-monorepo
description: Explore the Adobe Commerce Products GraphQL API

scripts.clean: rm -rf demo-storefront/dist && rm -rf demo-storefront/node_modules && rm -rf packages/**/node_modules && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -k -s all 'pnpm run start:proxy' 'pnpm run dev'
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production pnpm --filter demo-storefront run build && pnpm --filter demo-storefront run preview
